channel.title: Altar Concept Art
channel.description:
Hello Moparscape I Just Drew This Concept Of My "Second Age Altar"
Here's A Picture Of It, Im Going To Model It But Not Today =P Lol
[IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/241q9g8.jpg[/img]
Tell Me If Anything Else Should Be Added =} Sorry About The Quality =\

item.title: Altar Concept Art
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

[quote=“h1 sk1ller, post:44, topic:344803”]It Wasn’t A Showoff Thread Read “Altar Concept Art” If Im The One Who Needs To Grow Up… Don’t Troll on My Threads Because That Shows Your “Maturity” All I Did Was Over-React To A Bit Of “Criticism” It Wasn’t Constructive As He Didn’t Tell Me How To Make It Better You Idiot…[/quote]I hope you realize how stupid you look when you capitalize the first letter of every word.

And if it’s not a release or question thread, it’s a showoff thread. What else can you call it? None of us have trolled at all. It was constructive. He told you to make it look more like an altar.

[quote=“h1 sk1ller, post:46, topic:344803”]Yes You Are Your Spamming, Trolling, Flaming, Why Did I Even Post This… I Bet You Would Rather The Models Section To Die Again…[/quote]There has been no trolling. You posted it because it was a showoff thread. And yes, I would rather have the models section die than have this crap posted here.

Read full topic

item.title: Altar Concept Art
item.dc:creator: @Orngequirrel Orngequirrel
item.description:
@Orngequirrel wrote:

GUYS SHUT UP.

Must you spam this topic like immature 2 year olds? If nobody was better than another than nothing would be considered good, because everyone would argue that they can do the fucking same. Is posting a few sentences on a forum about illegal shit complaining about a 3d model going to help anything? I think not. You guys gotta stop arguing, it’s the pinnacle of anger. I’m ending this argument, anymore else and I PM a mod to lock this topic.

Read full topic

item.title: Altar Concept Art
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

[quote=“dylan_0789, post:39, topic:344803”][s][quote author=Davidi2 link=topic=441179.msg3241563#msg3241563 date=1276974895]

[quote author=dylan_0789 link=topic=441179.msg3241562#msg3241562 date=1276974812]
Too late. He wants to talk? I want action. Also, for the contest it’s required to show multiple [wip] images.
[/quote]We all know you are the better modeler. If you continue like this you will just start to look like an ass…
[/quote][s]
Mopars thought of me as an ass before. If this kid thinks he’s so ‘high and mighty’ he needs to be shown the reality of things. Don’t worry, I’ll go easy on him. He started this and I plan to end this.
I’ll call it off if he will admit he’s being self centered and will stop thinking himself a god. Or he can simply apologize and I’ll let the whole thing slip.

Also, If you read before: He challenged me. I just issued it a little more formally. [/s]
EDIT: Acually, I dont care. If he wants to he an idiot, ohwell.[/quote]Good. Hopefully he can just look at your posts and see that you are better than him. You don’t need to prove yourself to anyone.

Read full topic

item.title: Altar Concept Art
item.dc:creator: @dylan_0789 dylan_0789
item.description:
@dylan_0789 wrote:

[quote=“Davidi2, post:36, topic:344803”][quote author=dylan_0789 link=topic=441179.msg3241562#msg3241562 date=1276974812]
Too late. He wants to talk? I want action. Also, for the contest it’s required to show multiple [wip] images.
[/quote]We all know you are the better modeler. If you continue like this you will just start to look like an ass…[/quote]
[s]Mopars thought of me as an ass before. If this kid thinks he’s so ‘high and mighty’ he needs to be shown the reality of things. Don’t worry, I’ll go easy on him. He started this and I plan to end this.
I’ll call it off if he will admit he’s being self centered and will stop thinking himself a god. Or he can simply apologize and I’ll let the whole thing slip.

Also, If you read before: He challenged me. I just issued it a little more formally. [/s]
EDIT: Acually, I dont care. If he wants to he an idiot, ohwell. I don’t think its too fair to outstage a beginner when I know I’m more experienced…

But I do think I’m going to make a 2010 Camaro now.

Read full topic

item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

[quote=“h1 sk1ller, post:32, topic:344803”]Well It Doesn’t Bother Me Either =P[/quote]Mate, as a third party reading the argument I must give my point of view.
@Everyone
The people arguing against you are taking the totally wrong view and approach, as it’s completely off topic. But the point is Dylan is a much better modeler than you, and to say you are better instigated the flame war. I suggest everyone stops arguing and gets back on topic.

item.title: Altar Concept Art
item.dc:creator: @dylan_0789 dylan_0789
item.description:
@dylan_0789 wrote:

h1 sk1ller:

Of Course You Would Know Dylan When You Can’t Even Spell It… I Was Going To Add A Book And Something But I Thought Ill Do Another One =P Because This One Just, I Think It Fitted Not Having One Lol

No need to be a grammar nazi. Im sorry you’re being a complete idiot here. Don’t post somethign if you cannot handle criticism. Seriously? you have such a lack of respect that you feel you’re better than everyone here? Claiming you’re so GREAT at modeling yet you cant even learn to use a program? Alright its on. The model contest you versus me. The model will be a 2010 Hard top camaro. Show me your shit fuck head. I can rip you to shreds in a model contest. I STARTED OUT in meta. I can model in meta VERY easily. I can model in Blender even better.
http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,321439.0.html thats one of my first models in meta. I don’t see how you can expect to top me in modeling when:
a) you post a hand drawn image in a section named ‘Models’
b) you do not understand how your drawing looks like a pedestal.
Do what do you say? Accept or decline the 2010 Camaro model contest?

EDIT:
Not wasting my time.

Read full topic
